title: Hangzhou Foreign Languages School
data: Hangzhou Foreign Languages School (HFLS; 杭州外国语学校) is a public secondary school in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China. The school is managed by the Zhejiang Provincial Education Department.[2] Hangzhou Foreign Languages School was founded in 1964. In 1982, the school opened a foreign language vocational training class for on-the-job middle school teachers in English. In 2013, Hangzhou Foreign Languages School transitioned from the public-owned and private-run model to the public-run model.[3]
